artist: Artist: Joseph Mallord William Turner R.A.; Engraver: Thomas Goff Lupton
creditline: The Edith and Norman Garmezy Prints and Drawings Acquisition Fund
description: valley between steep mountain peaks; rocks and foliage in foreground; clouds extend to tops of peaks; tones of sepia
inscription:
Inscription

Top center, above image, in brown: [M]; below image, in brown: [Drawn and Etched by J.M.W. Turner Esq. R.A.P.P. BEN ARTHUR, SCOTLAND/London. Pub. Jan 1819 by J.M.W. Turner Queen Anne Str. West. Engraved by T. Lutton]; on front and back, in pencil: various notations; on back: 2 stamps.
medium: Etching and mezzotint in sepia ink
title: Ben Arthur, Scotland, from "Liber Studiorum"
